title: Usage of Wiki
content:
Usage of Wiki #  This page tells how to edit this wiki.
 Get started Write your first article  1. Get Started #  Install Git #  If you haven’t installed Git yet, look here
Install Hugo #  This webpage is generated by Hugo.
To install Hugo, you copy below and paste it to install on your machine,
 MacOS Windows  and hugo-extended is also required. install hugo-extended through above software.
2. Write Your First Article #  Clone Repository #  Copy below and paste to your command line,
git clone -- recursive https://github.com/flat35hd99-test/flat35hd99-test.github.io.git {file name as you like} cd {file name} Create New Page #  Open the folder you just cloned and see the repository.
You can write new page on content/docs/{category as you like}.
Then create new file in the category you chose.
When you name a new file, use _ instead of white space and .md as extension.
Write A Page #  Now you can write articles AS YOU LIKE!!!!!!
If you aren’t familiar with markdown, please look this page.
Commit and Push #

title: Get Started
content:
Get started #  Git and GitHub are very usefull tool and web application. This page describe how to install Git and create GitHub account.
Create GitHub account and get student developer pack #  You can use Gitlab but I like GitHub because GitHub provides Student Development Pack that is the same as Enterprise plan for free.(!!!)
 Access toppage Click “Sign up” button. fill in the blanks.  Username is published to internet. PLEASE take carefull. I use “flat35hd99” but someone is using full name. If you understand what you do, you can do it. Email address is your Email address to get important notification from GitHub. you can change after sign up. Note: GitHub NERVER send you spam. Password is password. Email preferences is unchecked. Verify your account, Click button to check you is not robot. After check your input is correct, Click Create Account. Open your Email(You input the address in step 3.2) box and verify by clicking button.    Install Git #  If your machine’s OS is Windows, you can install Git via GitHub Desktop. You can install just Git via official installer but it has only command line interface(CLI) and install process have a little dificulity. I recommend you to use GUI if you are a beginner, so we use GitHub Desktop.
 Access the site, download installer file. Click installer file to install app. Click Sign in to GitHub.com. Browser will be appeared. Click Authorize desktop. This allow app to access your GitHub data. Click some button to return app. You meybe see Configure Git page in app. Email is configured github’s sample email address, so Select your GitHub email address. Click Finish.  Congraturation! You have finished. Start manage repository by Git!
Would you like to use Command line Interface ? Reffer to How to Set Path page.

content: CURrent calculation for Proteins is software for calculating some current(flux).

title: Policy
content:
Policy #  All Yamato-group members feel free to write articles.
Be active to use this website and it will be helpful to straighten your thinking.
All members can read your articles. When you write them on this wiki, you need to do as somewhat easy to understand.

title: Tips
content:

title: How to Set Path
content:
How to Set Path #  This pages is for user of Github Desktop on Windows10.
Find where is GIt #  Open file explorer and find path looks like below C:\Users\username\AppData\Local\GitHubDesktop\app-2.9.0\resources\app\git\cmd
username and app-2.9.0 is different by every user.
Have you found git.exe ?
next, we set environment variable.
Edit Environment Variable. #   Windows + S and input environment variable and Enter.(in japanese, システム変数の...) Open Environment Variables(環境変数) Click below  Add the path.(新規)  Open new terminal, type git, and Enter.  Finished !
